title: Table 403.6 — Public Swimming Pool: Required Fixtures Count Per Square Foot

content.heading: Table 403.6 — Public Swimming Pool: Required Fixtures Count Per Square Foot

content.text: This table outlines the minimum number of water closets (WC) and lavatories required in **public swimming pool restrooms**, based on the square footage of the facility.

table:
| **WC** | 1 per 2,500 for first 10,000 sq ft,
1 per 5,000 for remainder exceeding 10,000 | **WC** | 1 per 1,250 for first 10,000 sq ft,
1 per 2,500 for remainder exceeding 10,000 |

| **Lavatory** | 1 per 5,000 for first 10,000 sq ft,
1 per 10,000 for remainder exceeding 10,000 | **Lavatory** | 1 per 5,000 for first 10,000 sq ft,
1 per 10,000 for remainder exceeding 10,000 |
